alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Lincoln (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:03PM CDT until May 16 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN MADISON...SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES... At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Huntland, or 14 miles southeast of Fayetteville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntland, Lincoln, Francisco, Beans Creek, Plevna, Flintville, Elora, Crystal Springs and Larkin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
